snippet.title: Tamarak Trail - Release Date Announcement | Demo Is Out
snippet.description:
✔️Wishlist Tamarak Trail and Play The Demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1591220/Tamarak_Trail/

Tamarak Trail Arrives on PC, Xbox, Playstation, and Nintendo on February 29

Battle through handcrafted trails full of loot, mysteries, and danger in this deck-building roguelike.

🎲 Craft fully customizable dice!
🎲 Use dice sets with physics-based rolls and infinite combos
🎲 Play as one of three character classes with distinctive gameplay
🎲 Immerse yourself into a meticulously hand-drawn, randomly generated trail full of mysteries and challenges
🎲 Discover eldritch artifacts that drastically change your battle style and strategy
